questions.question: FME Server runs one job per engine at a time.
How might you take advantage of an FME Server with multiple engines when running a single workspace?
options: Running the workspace via the Data Streaming service.
Running the single workspace on the same data on multiple engines.
Splitting the workspace into multiple workspaces that can run concurrently.
Running the workspace on multiple FME Server instances.

questions.question: How many FME engines does FME Cloud have available?
options: A choice of two, four, or eight
It depends on the FME license chosen
It depends on the virtual machine specifications
